titles.title: A bill to extend the deadline under the Federal Power Act applicable to the construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of Oregon.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5755)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power.

bill.summary: 5/11/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to extend for a specified maximum period the time required for commencement of construction of a certain hydroelectric project in the State of Oregon.
